long_description: Great for cycling, running, and active sports when the sun is high, the Tifosi Radius Readers Sunglasses offer +1.5 or +2.0 magnification for reading cyclometers, watches, GPS units, phones and more. Smoke lenses feature a neutral gray tint that helps prevent color distortion. Made of Grilamid TR-90, a homopolyamide nylon characterized by an extremely high alternative bending strength, low density, and high resistance to chemical and UV damage. Hydrophilic rubber ear and nose pieces provide a no-slip fit. Adjustable temples and nose pieces. The Tifosi Radius Readers Sunglasses feature vented lenses to improve air circulation and help prevent fogging.
short_description: Great for cycling, running, and active sports when the sun is high, the Tifosi Radius Readers Sunglasses offer +1.5 or +2.0 magnification for reading cyclometers, watches, GPS units, phones and more.
